#### Rawdog: A natural language CLI tool.

```bash
rawdog what are the five largest files in this repository
```

#### Nougat: PDF to Markdown Conversion

- [Project Webpage](https://facebookresearch.github.io/nougat/)
- [Paper](https://arxiv.org/abs/2308.13418)
- [Github](https://github.com/facebookresearch/nougat)

```bash
# Install
pip install nougat-ocr

# Run
nougat path/to/file.pdf -o output_directory

# Finetuning, etc. see github
```
